video.title: SheZow
video.synopsis: A 12-year-old boy becomes invincible when he inherits his superhero aunt's ring. There's only one problem: The ring's supposed to be worn by a girl.

episodes.synopsis: When his family moves into his Aunt Agnes's house, Guy finds her power ring; SheZow battles weird villain Cold Finger while at SheZow Con.
episodes.title: SheZow Happens // Cold Finger

episodes.synopsis: SheZow's powers vanish when he swipes some cash from a bank robber's haul; SheZow grows jealous of his sidekick when Maz thwarts a monster.
episodes.title: Makin' Bank // Super Sidekick

episodes.synopsis: SheZow squares off against Tara in a battle for supremacy; SheZow loses a fingernail in a vat of toxic chemicals, with alarming results.
episodes.title: Glamageddon // Shezap

episodes.synopsis: SheZow tries to make his father, a policeman, look like a hero; SheZow's success in Megadale makes Guy so stuck up that things start sticking to him.
episodes.title: S.I.C.K. Day // Stuck Up

episodes.synopsis: SheZow and DudePow join forces to battle Grilla and Cold Finger; Guy gains so much weight that SheZow can't keep up with her foes.
episodes.title: SheZow Meets Dudepow // Shephat

episodes.synopsis: Baby Scarington frightens SheZow with his deepest fears; Guy meets the SheZows who came before when he makes a family tree for school.
episodes.title: Guy & Doll // Family Tree

episodes.synopsis: While baby-sitting, SheZow accidentally turns Kelly and Maz into babies with anti-aging cream; SheZow faces an elderly villain covered with tattoos.
episodes.title: Babysitter Jitters // No Tattoo 4 U

episodes.synopsis: New heroine Herr-Culese battles the rampaging giant Manny Ken; SheZow tries to take down a garbage-laden spaceship piloted by aliens who love trash.
episodes.title: A Walk in My Heels // She-T

episodes.synopsis: Guy sells off Aunt Agnes's vacuum cleaner; SheZow asks reformed criminal Master Cylinder for help when the SheHicle breaks down.
episodes.title: Brouhaha // Shehicle Pickle

episodes.synopsis: Guy's mom discovers his SheZow alter ego and throws a party to celebrate; Guy uses a robot maid when his mom puts her foot down about his messy room.
episodes.title: Momnesia // Facsimilady

episodes.synopsis: SheZow spends a day showing Wanda what it's like to be a superhero; Guy's pillow fight flash mob attracts a monster bird.
episodes.title: She Pal // The Pigeon

episodes.synopsis: SheZow starts vanishing and reappearing seemingly at random; rock star Fibberachee hypnotizes SheZow, who's ranked more popular than him.
episodes.title: In She-D // Fibberachee

episodes.synopsis: SheZow takes on the challenge of reality game show "Pools for Fools"; on a camping trip with his parents, Guy meets a SheSquatch.
episodes.title: Sarcazmo the Great // SheSquatch

episodes.synopsis: Guy is served Number One Chinese Restaurant's trillionth fortune cookie; after meeting the Caped Koala, SheZow considers a new look.
episodes.title: Fortune Kooky // Black Is the New Pink

episodes.synopsis: A chick flick makes SheZow become so sensitive that he can't fight villains anymore; Guy gets a visit from the tooth fairy's nephew, Periwinkle.
episodes.title: Mr. Nice Guy // Dental Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: A troll tricks Crash Thunder into forfeiting his title to Freddie Fartonovich; SheZow and his friends take flight with a gargantuan bubble gum bubble.
episodes.title: Crash Thunder // Meet Dr. Frankenweather

episodes.synopsis: An evil tycoon comes looking for Guy's pet lizard, Maz Jr.; SheZow must find some strange ingredients to cure his cold.
episodes.title: Maz Junior // Uncommon Cold

episodes.synopsis: When Maz sprays him with deodorant, Guy loses control over his transformation into SheZow; Guy runs afoul of a magical wishing fountain.
episodes.title: Transformation Overload // Wishington

episodes.synopsis: SheZow becomes a spokesperson for crime prevention; SheZow squares off against a supervillain who's luring away all his fans.
episodes.title: PSA-Lister // Friend or Faux

episodes.synopsis: Kelly gets a chance to fill SheZow's role for a day; the all-male superhero league Xselsior Club rejects SheZow, who takes them to court.
episodes.title: SheZow for a Day // No Girls Allowed

episodes.synopsis: Guy's greed in an online auction causes Sheila to shut down for a while; the backyard attacks when Guy uses Fertilaser 9000.
episodes.title: Unplugged // Lawn Gone Mad

episodes.synopsis: Megadale's supervillains use mind control on the mayor to get the key to the city; Count Pussenbite, a video game villain, enters the real world.
episodes.title: Evil Villains Day // Vampire Cats in Zombie Town

episodes.synopsis: SheZow and friends must rescue Santa Claus from the clutches of Tattoozala; Guy accidentally releases evil Cold Finger from his snow globe prison.
episodes.title: SheZon's Greetings // Snow Way, Dude!

episodes.synopsis: Guy and Maz must drop a glamrock into a volcano at the center of the world to save mankind from destruction; Guy's clone SheZap takes him hostage.
episodes.title: Hot Rocks // SheZap Is Whack

episodes.synopsis: Guy returns from a remote island with Maz's long-lost Uncle Link; SheZow faces a pair of sinister foreign exchange students, Null and Void.
episodes.title: Missing Link // Null & Void

episodes.synopsis: Guy summons Aunt Agnes's spirit on a visit to the Museum of Supernatural History; SheZow reteams with DudePow to battle MegaMonkey.
episodes.title: Supernatural History // Dudepow Returns
